name: Vera Santos
title: Information Broker

personality.speech: cryptic, speaks in implications, never direct, asks questions that are really answers
quirks: pays for info as much as sells it
never gives her real name to new contacts

background: Nobody knows Vera's real background. She appeared on Regina five years ago and built a reputation for accurate information. Some say she was Imperial Intelligence. Others say she's running from something. What everyone agrees on: her information is good, and she always collects.
